description: The classic Ferrosi Hoodie is updated for 2022, and better than ever for climbing and multi-sport use. The primary fabric is 45% recycled with improved stretch, while Cordura® protects high abrasion zones. The hood fits over a climbing helmet, has peripheral adjustment and stows away for running and biking.
name: Outdoor Research Ferrosi Hoodie - Mens

specs.value: bluesign® approved 86% Nylon (46% Recycled), 14% Spandex 90D Stretch Woven Ripstop
Cordura® bluesign® approved 91% Nylon, 9% Spandex 120D Stretch Woven
